comments:
Build 200307172359

Starting a runtime workbench (that I had just started and shutdown succesfully) 
with the JDT/Core debug tracing on, I got the following stack trace in the 
console:

From glancing at it, it looks like ClassLoaderStats isn't thread safe at all. 
If there are concurrent class loads I wouldn't be surprised to see exceptions
like this.  Jerome, you must have had the class load monitoring options turned on...

Right, I thought I just had the jdt.core trace on, but I also had the core.boot 
trace on.

I've made a quick pass to try to make this code thread safe.  Released to HEAD.
Note that users should generally have these trace options turned off because
they induce a big performance hit.
